name: Foosball World Tour Free
description:
Now you can play Foosball on the go! Have your very own Foosball table on your iPhone, iPod, and now iPad!

This isn't just any Foosball game, though, this is World Tour!

Choose from one of twelve international teams and go head to head against the computer or a friend in either 1 Player or 2 Player modes.

Foosball World Tour is loaded with features like the option to move rows independently, sound effects, music, great graphics, and realistic physics.

In addition, you can customize your game by setting ball speed, field type, computer difficulty, and much more!

Go ahead, kick around the ball and see for yourself!
